content.text:
# List of wars involving Morocco

}}
This is a list of wars involving the Kingdom of Morocco and the former entities that ruled the modern polity.
:
:
:
:

* Ali Abu Hassun rules Fez as an Ottoman vassal.

(1554)

| style="background:#D0FFD0" |Victory
* The Saadi dynasty becomes the undisputed ruler of Morocco.
* Death of Ali Abu Hassun and end of the Wattasid dynasty.
*Fez is no longer an Ottoman vassal.

Ottoman Empire

1,500 dead
(Spanish source)

* Morocco fails to expand.

* France annexes El Bayadh, Chellala, Boussemghoun and Tiout.

| style="background:#efefef" | France

* French military victory.
